meanings.sent1: The after meeting was scheduled for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The after party will start once the concert ends.
meanings.sent3: The after cupcakes were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The after glow of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The after school program offers tutoring for students.

meanings.sent1: The dog ran after the squirrel in the park.
meanings.sent2: She chased after the ice cream truck for a sweet treat.
meanings.sent3: The kids played tag, running after each other in the yard.
meanings.sent4: He followed after his dreams with determination and passion.
meanings.sent5: The detective went after the criminal to solve the case.

meanings.definition: In allusion to; in imitation of.
meanings.sent1: The painting was modeled after a famous artist's style.
meanings.sent2: Her fashion sense was inspired after her favorite celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The play was written after a classic Shakespearean tragedy.
meanings.sent4: The movie was made after the bestselling novel.
meanings.sent5: The recipe was recreated after a traditional family dish.

meanings.sent1: She arrived shortly after the party started.
meanings.sent2: The bus arrived after we had already left the bus stop.
meanings.sent3: He ran after to catch up with his friends ahead.
meanings.sent4: The cat followed after, slowly making its way down the street.
meanings.sent5: The rain stopped after, leaving behind puddles on the sidewalk.
